releases.title: Enhanced Update Experience & Node Management
highlights: Node hardware specification cards with detailed views
Universal progress bar styling throughout the application
Collapsible CLI output with terminal styling

items: Added non-dismissible update modal with step-by-step progress tracking
Implemented collapsible CLI output with dark terminal theme
Enhanced settings page with beautiful card layouts
Added gradient buttons with hover animations and micro-interactions
Created universal progress bar system with indeterminate and percentage modes
Added node hardware specification cards grouped by Control Plane and Workers
Implemented detailed node modal with complete kubectl describe information
Added node conditions, labels, and taints display
Created responsive node card layout with status indicators
Fixed pod allocation to only count worker nodes (excluding control plane)
Applied universal progress bar styling to all loading states
Enhanced visual feedback with smooth animations and transitions
Improved modal accessibility and error handling
Added comprehensive debugging and fallback mechanisms
Created consistent HPE design language throughout the application

bugfixes: Fixed Bootstrap modal initialization errors with proper fallback handling
Resolved node details modal not found issues with dynamic creation
Corrected pod utilization calculations to exclude control plane nodes
Fixed modal backdrop and keyboard event handling
technical: Migrated database schema to support worker-only pod allocation
Enhanced error handling for modal initialization
Improved progress tracking with real-time step updates
Added comprehensive logging for debugging and monitoring
